project.name: |-- 004-java8-library-predicate
project.description:
Keywords: + Lambdas, lambda expressions + Predicate, Consumer and Function Functional Interfaces.
This project includes several simple examples regarding the Java 8 functional interfaces Predicate, Consumer and Function.
PredicateLambdaRunner: Demonstrate how to leverage the Predicate functional interface from Java 8 library to perform filtering on numbers and strings.
ConsumerLambdaRunner: Demonstrate how to leverage the Consumer functional interface from Java 8 library to perform an operation on each of the elements of a collection.
FunctionLambdaRunner: Demonstrate how to leverage the Function functional interface from Java 8 library to perform mapping on collections of numbers and strings.
